<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief tract on the fourth commandment wherein is discover'd the cause of all our controversies about the Sabbath-day, and the means of reconciling them ...Recommended by the Reverend Dr. Bates, and Mr. John How. Chafie, Thomas.
[14], 74, [2] p.
Printed for Tho. Parkhurst ... and for Jon. Robinson ..., London : 1692.
Also identified as Wing B1099, reel 2323, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700". Attributed to Thomas Chafie. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproductions of originals in Edinburgh University Library and the British Library.
=======

[14], 74, [2] p.
Printed for Tho. Parkhurst ... and for Jon. Robinson ..., London : 1692.
Also identified as Wing B1099, reel 2323, of the UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700". Attributed to Thomas Chafie. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproductions of originals in Edinburgh University Library and the British Library.
Jon. Robinson
